name: The Secret of Monkey Island: Recoded
summary:
A timeline never seen before, where the choices can branch out into infinite realities of endless possibility, creating alternate puzzles from the ones you know.
Young pirate wanna-be Guybrush Threepwood sets out to pass the Three Trials, woo the governess Elaine Marley, reach the fabled Monkey Island and vanquish the nefarious ghost pirate LeChuck.
